user-management
=========

This role creates users with its groups (optional) and public keys for SSH (optional).

Role Variables
--------------

Example for an user:
```yaml
- username: testuser
  usergroup: testuser
  groups:
    - sudo
  hostname_groups:
    - libvirt
  shell: /bin/bash
  pubkeys:
    - ssh-rsa  testuser@ws
```

The user is only created if a specific variable is created:
```yaml
create_<username>: true
```

Shown in the example above the following line is needed to create the testuser:
```yaml
create_testuser: true
```

Add groups to user on a specific host only:
```yaml
<hostname>_groups:
 - libvirt
```

Example Playbook
----------------
```yaml
- hosts: servers
  roles:
     - ansible-roles/user_management
```
